about_the_game:
Free Will Original Soundtrack fully composed and produced by Johannah “johh” Chung and Justin Shin.
Available in .wav format on other streaming platforms. (only .mp3 format on Steam)

Tracklist

2. Will’s Room 1:01

8. Laser Tag With Kipps! 1:11
9. Breakfast Time (Kitchen) 0:54
10. mom.exe 1:28
11. Dad’s Study 1:28
12. Wendy’s Room 1:47
13. BACK TO ME 1:04
14. wendy.exe 1:24
15. fake-out 2:16
16. We’ll Try It Again 1:14
17. sequence 14 (Basement) 1:30
18. Forgotten 1:00
19. corruption.exe 1:52
20. Error; Not Found 1:33
21. The code has ended. 1:10
